meaning: She is the witness (sākshi) for every action and every thought of each and every being in this creation (vishwa, jagat).
commentary: (विश्व-साक्षिनी ((Viśva-sākṣinī) is one name and there should be no gap between Vishwa and sākshini. It is wrong to read as ‘Sadyah prasadini विस्ह्wआ (vishwā) (gap) sākshini sākshi varjita’.)
